item.title: Fraud & Anomaly Detection Using ELK Stack, Kibana & Python Elast-Alert
item.description:
Description

Title Talk by Dhruv Kalaan( @@DKalaan ) at PyDelhi Meetup on 5th Mar 2016. Slides and content available at https://cfp.pydelhi.org/pydelhi-conference-2016/proposals/fraud-anomaly-detection-using-elk-stack-kibana-python-elast-alert/

Visit https://pydelhi.org/talks for more.
item.dc:creator: Dhruv Kalaan
